snippet: Who says Albany isn’t cultured? Despite some suggestions that the Legislature had better things to do, a bill to designate yogurt as the official state snack easily passed the Senate and went to the Assembly.
abstract: Bill to designate yogurt as the official state snack passes New York State Senate and goes to the Assembly.
lead_paragraph: Who says Albany isn’t cultured? Despite some suggestions that the Legislature had better things to do, a bill to designate yogurt as the official state snack easily passed the Senate and went to the Assembly.

headline.main: Animated Debate in New York State Capital? It’s About Yogurt
headline.print_headline: Animated Debate in State Capital? It’s About Yogurt
